nodes.text: GL-916 was a vendor droid on Coruscant. The droid sold various wares at a stand. He boasted the qualities of his products and was willing to reduce prices for the cost-conscious customer.
When R2-D2 asked GL-916 about the missing C-3PO, he replied that he knew nothing of his whereabouts and proceed to attempt to sell his merchandise to R2-D2.
